Package svtool.core

Interface Summary
Configurable Parent interface of all objects that can read and write configurations from an XML document.
ResourceManager Manages access to files and resources and relieves individual classes the burden of having to open the files (from disk or network) themselves.
Task The parent class of all Task objects.
TaskMonitor Super class of all interfaces that monitor statuses of tasks.
 

Class Summary
SVUtils A few comonly used utilities.
SwingWorker This is the 3rd version of SwingWorker (also known as SwingWorker 3), an abstract class that you subclass to perform GUI-related work in a dedicated thread.
XMLUtils Some stuff for writing to an XML File.
